start.text:
Hello and welcome to the Kyuartz Website! I'm Meo, your friendly virtual assistant 💬✨

How can I help you today? 😘💕

options.text: 🎨 How can I commission an artwork?

aboutCommission.text: 🖌️ Want a custom artwork made just for you? You can visit the Commission Sheet Page to learn more about pricing, styles, and how to submit a request. 😊

options.text: 📩 What happens after I send a request?
📬 How do I contact the artist?

aboutCommissionProcess.text: ✅ Once your commission request is submitted, the artist will review it and get in touch to confirm details, pricing, and delivery time. You can also track your commission on the Commission Status Page.

aboutContactArtist.text: 📨 You can get in touch with the artist anytime through the Contact Page. Email and social media links are available there — feel free to ask anything! 💌

aboutPaymentOptions.text: 💳 Kyuartz accepts multiple payment methods, including PayPal, Maya, GCash, and credit/debit cards. You can view the full list on the Contact Page. Let us know your preferred method!

aboutServices.text:
🖼️ Kyuartz offers a variety of creative services like:

• 🎨 Custom artwork commissions
• 🖨️ Art prints
• 📥 Digital downloads

For policies and FAQs, check out:
- Terms of Service
- Privacy Policy
- FAQ Page

options.text: ⚠️ How do I report an issue?

reportIssue.text:
⚠️ If something’s not working or you spot a problem, please report it via the Customer Support Page.

📧 You can also reach out through email or social media — we’ll take care of it as quickly as possible! 💪

aboutKyu.text: 👩‍🎨 Kyu is the talented artist behind Kyuartz! They're passionate about creating unique, expressive art and connecting with the community through creative projects and commissions. 🎉

options.text: 🧭 What can I do on Kyuartz?

aboutKyuartz.text:
🖌️ Kyuartz is a creative platform where you can:

• Commission custom artwork 🎨
• Browse and purchase prints 🖼️
• Explore digital downloads 💾

Whether you’re here to collect art, support Kyu, or just enjoy the vibe — there’s something here for everyone! 💖

aboutHelp.text:
🧠 I’m here to help with anything you need! You can ask me about:

• Commissioning artwork 🎨
• Payment options 💳
• Services offered 🛠️
• Kyu or Kyuartz 🌟

Got a specific question or something on your mind? Just let me know! 💬
